Text: You're a bit off-subject there jimmyhere. Keep your comments relevant to the subject. @jamminfletch, thank you, these are indeed very useful for teachers.

jimmyhere,

Im getting a bit tired of your anti-pedo comments. Any infestation on these torrents are from people like you. Pedophile stands for lover of children, nothing else. Bad thoughts are only in your head. People like you come and go but get absolutely no where except from a ban and rightly so. If you want to debate the subject then take your nonsense to a forum but this is not the place.
